text: Netflix charges its customers a minimum monthly fee of $2 in India to avail its services of on-demand entertainment.
Samsung sells its mobile phones at a starting range of $150.
Ikea sells its furniture items permitting installments.
Hertz lets drivers borrow a car for a few days for a fee based on the number of days itâ€™s used.
Apple sells its laptop at a starting range of $1500.
Substack makes readers pay a monthly fee to access articles, books, poetry, music, and videos among other literary and audiovisual entertainment.
Furlenco allows residents to use home furnishings and appliances for a fee based on the duration of time they are used.
Listeners can pay a specific amount on a monthly basis to listen to songs and podcasts on Apple Music
